It is provided "as is" without express or implied 34 // warranty. 35 41 #ifndef PB_DS_SPLAY_TREE_NODE_AND_IT_TRAITS_HPP 42 #define PB_DS_SPLAY_TREE_NODE_AND_IT_TRAITS_HPP 43 44 #include <ext/pb_ds/detail/splay_tree_/node.hpp> 45 46 namespace __gnu_pbds 47 { 48 namespace detail 49 { 52 template<typename Key, 53 typename Mapped, 54 typename Cmp_Fn, 55 template<typename Node_CItr, 56 typename Node_Itr, 57 typename Cmp_Fn_, 58 typename _Alloc_> 59 class Node_Update, 60 typename _Alloc> 61 struct tree_traits<Key, Mapped, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, splay_tree_tag, _Alloc> 62 : public bin_search_tree_traits<Key, Mapped, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, 63 splay_tree_node_< 64 typename types_traits<Key, Mapped, _Alloc, false>::value_type, 65 typename tree_node_metadata_dispatch<Key, Mapped, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, 66 _Alloc>::type, 67 _Alloc>, 68 _Alloc> 69 { }; 70 73 template<typename Key, 74 class Cmp_Fn, 75 template<typename Node_CItr, 76 class Node_Itr, 77 class Cmp_Fn_, 78 typename _Alloc_> 79 class Node_Update, 80 typename _Alloc> 81 struct tree_traits<Key, null_type, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, 82 splay_tree_tag, _Alloc> 83 : public bin_search_tree_traits<Key, null_type, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, 84 splay_tree_node_< 85 typename types_traits<Key, null_type, _Alloc, false>::value_type, 86 typename tree_node_metadata_dispatch<Key, null_type, Cmp_Fn, Node_Update, 87 _Alloc>::type, 88 _Alloc>, 89 _Alloc> 90 { }; 91 92 } // namespace detail 93 } // namespace __gnu_pbds 94 95 #endif // #ifndef PB_DS_SPLAY_TREE_NODE_AND_IT_TRAITS_HPP
